w: to bring you this good news
that a census should be taken
She wrapped Him in swaddling cloths
Do not take money by force
[the devil] led Him up to a high place
to throw Him over the cliff
I did not consider myself worthy
as they go on their way
we wipe off as a testimony
he passed by on the other side
he passed by on the other side
will not be taken away from
[ all of ] it will be charged
This is how [it will be for]
he will dress himself to serve
will have them recline at the table
he will put him in charge
he will cut him to pieces
who lived each day in joyous
they will not be persuaded even
They will level you to the ground
May such a thing never happen
